entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Package validation fail #41199

Closed

  • Project restore fails for .NET MAUI Hybrid App on .NET 8 - Workload dependency issue #40978
  • global.json file SDK version is "9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5" but I dont see that SDK version anywhere #41176
  • [net7] Creating a cross-targeted `net7.0-ios` + `net6.0-ios` packages forces consumers to build with net7 workloads #30103

PullRequests

Created

  • Added missing -nativeToolsOnMachine #41218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix CodeOwners file #41216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix build-configuration.json upload #41212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix fsharp stage 2 source-build #41215
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Update DotNetBuild.props #41082
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix localization in .NET Workload Information Display #41195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Update to may implicit version #41177
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to may implicit version #41164
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix license scan test pipeline #41214
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix fsharp stage 2 source-build #41197
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Fix license scan test pipeline #41200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41131
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use the VMR commit hash for dotnet --info #41190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make the CleanupRepo target use inputs & outputs #41196
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use version comparison function #41102
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds fingerprinting support for assets #41092
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Enhancements to Pull Request Creation/Update in `CreateBaselineUpdatePR` Tool #41160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for PreferNativeArm64 #40895
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Dispose streams created by File.Create #41120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
